statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 5, experience = 1000 WHERE player_id = 'c562a0b2-6b45-4b2b-9f9f-60c142cb8aae';
UPDATE player_profiles SET age = 25, email = 'example@example.com' WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';

UPDATE player_profiles SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com', age = 25 WHERE player_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE player_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', birthdate='1990-05-20' WHERE player_id=101;
UPDATE game_progress SET score=500, last_played='2022-01-15 18:30:00' WHERE player_id=101 AND level=3;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'Alice', birthdate = '1990-05-15', country = 'USA' WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE game_progress SET score = 500, last_played = '2022-03-10 08:00:00' WHERE player_id = 123 AND level = 5;

UPDATE achievements SET achievement_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE player_id = 2;

UPDATE game_progress SET last_played = '2022-10-05 15:30:00', progress_percentage = 75.5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET name='Alice Smith', age=25 WHERE player_id=12345;
UPDATE player_friends SET player_id=54321, friend_id=67890 WHERE player_id=54321 AND friend_id=12345;
UPDATE player_profiles SET email = 'example@email.com', age = 25 WHERE player_id = 1;
